Name: Winning Ribbon
Desc: Ribbon awarded for clearing Hoenn's Battle Tower's Lv. 50 challenge.

Name: Victory Ribbon
Desc: Ribbon awarded for clearing Hoenn's Battle Tower's Lv. 100 challenge.

Name: Ability Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for defeating the Tower Tycoon at the Battle Tower.

Name: Great Ability Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for defeating the Tower Tycoon at the Battle Tower.

Name: Double Ability Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for completing the Battle Tower Double challenge.

Name: Multi Ability Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for completing the Battle Tower Multi challenge.

Name: Pair Ability Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for completing the Battle Tower Link Multi challenge.

Name: World Ability Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for completing the Wi-Fi Battle Tower challenge.

Name: Champion Ribbon
Desc: Ribbon for clearing the Pokémon League and entering the Hall of Fame in another region.

Name: Sinnoh Champ Ribbon
Desc: Ribbon awarded for beating the Sinnoh Champion and entering the Hall of Fame.

Name: Record Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for setting an incredible record.

Name: Event Ribbon
Desc: Pokémon Event Participation Ribbon.

Name: Legend Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for setting a legendary record.

Name: Gorgeous Ribbon
Desc: An extraordinarily gorgeous and extravagant Ribbon.

Name: Royal Ribbon
Desc: An incredibly regal Ribbon with an air of nobility.

Name: Gorgeous Royal Ribbon
Desc: A gorgeous and regal Ribbon that is the peak of fabulous.

Name: Alert Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling an invigorating event that created life energy.

Name: Shock Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling a thrilling event that made life more exciting.

Name: Downcast Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling feelings of sadness that added spice to life.

Name: Careless Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling a careless error that helped steer life decisions.

Name: Relax Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling a refreshing event that added sparkle to life.

Name: Snooze Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling a deep slumber that made life soothing.

Name: Smile Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon for recalling that smiles enrich the quality of life.

Name: Footprint Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon deemed to have a top-quality footprint.

Name: Artist Ribbon
Desc: Ribbon awarded for being chosen as a super sketch model in Hoenn.

Name: Effort Ribbon
Desc: Ribbon awarded for being an exceptionally hard worker.

Name: Birthday Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon to celebrate a birthday.

Name: Special Ribbon
Desc: A special Ribbon for a special day.

Name: Classic Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon that proclaims love for Pokémon.

Name: Premier Ribbon
Desc: Special Holiday Ribbon.

Name: Souvenir Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon to cherish a special memory.

Name: Wishing Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon said to make your wish come true.

Name: National Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for overcoming all difficult challenges.

Name: Country Ribbon
Desc: Pokémon League Champion Ribbon.

Name: Battle Champion Ribbon
Desc: Battle Competition Champion Ribbon.

Name: Regional Champion Ribbon
Desc: Pokémon World Championships Regional Champion Ribbon.

Name: Earth Ribbon
Desc: A Ribbon awarded for winning 100 matches in a row.

Name: World Ribbon
Desc: Pokémon League Champion Ribbon.

Name: National Champion Ribbon
Desc: Pokémon World Championships National Champion Ribbon.

Name: World Champion Ribbon
Desc: Pokémon World Championships World Champion Ribbon.
